mapper.sql: id, tracker_id, project_id, subject, description, due_date, category_id, status_id, assigned_to_id, priority_id, fixed_version_id, author_id, lock_version, created_on, updated_on, start_date, done_ratio, estimated_hours, parent_id, root_id, lft, rgt, is_private, closed_on
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from public.issues
order by ${orderByClause}
